id.title: Program ID
id.description: Globally unique program ID, special characters are not allowed

description.title: Program Description
description.description: A description of the program that may be used by user interfaces

disabled.title: Auto-start Disabled
disabled.description: Disable the auto-start of the script on system boot

envvars.title: Environment Variables
envvars.description: Name/Value pairs that can be used to set configuration of a program

scope.title: Program Scope
scope.description: The scope (location) to which the script belongs. Leave blank for global scope

provider.title: Programming Language
provider.description: The language the program is written in

script.title: Program File Name
script.description: The file name of the main entry point of the program. Defaults to index.<extension>

files.description: List of files to include in the program

plugins.description: List of plugins to include in the program
